mapper.select:
select distinct returned_id from bu_material_returned_detail where id
in
#{returnDetailId}
= '-1'

SELECT t.*, t8.code as locationCode, t5.category1, t3.train_no, t3.order_code, t5.code as materialCode, t5.name as materialName, t5.spec as materialSpec, IFNULL(t1.unit_price, 0) as materialUnitPrice, t1.confirm_time, t3.line_id, t7.depot_id, t4.id AS workshopId, t4.name as workshopName, t6.id AS trainid, t7.repair_program_id AS programId, t3.fd_project, t3.fd_task, t3.fd_cost_type FROM bu_material_returned_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.order_material_id left join bu_material_returned t2 on t2.id = t.returned_id LEFT JOIN bu_work_order t3 ON t3.id = t2.work_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t4 ON t4.id = t3.workshop_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t5 ON t5.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_info t6 on t6.train_no = t3.train_no LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t7 on t7.id = t3.plan_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t8 on t8.wbs = t.location_wbs where t.returned_id = #{returnId}

select t.*, t1.trans_id, t1.trans_time, t1.success_status, t1.success_time, t1.message from bu_material_returned_detail t left join bu_maximo_trans_data t1 on t1.obj_id = t.id where t.returned_id
in
#{returnId}
= '-1'
